  • Back to the roots!

    Apr 15, 2014:

    Spring has arrived, so I'll celebrate by making this message short and sweet! Tomorrow Wednesday April 16 at 7pm, I will be "exploring" on stage the American adaptation of the play "Shoot The Freak" as part of the Drama League 'Rough Draft Residency'. [Read more...]

  • Step by Step!

    Mar 12, 2014:

    Forcing yourself to take risks on a regular basis does feel amazing. But I haven't been that mentally exhausted and challenged since I had to switch from French to English when I moved here 4 years ago! Last month, as part of the Career Mastery course I am following, I tried to get in touch with Jodie Foster to ask her questions about her career. [Read more...]

  • All about the mindset!

    Feb 4, 2014:

    In a career like acting, it always comes down to "How bad do you want it?" and personally, I am afraid of taking risks, rejection and failure. Seems like I'm hitting a wall here, aren't I! Well, I've decided to change that. [Read more...]
